name: Javelin Robotics
headline: Copilot for truckers
description: We help truckers cut delivery times, increasing productivity and adding much needed capacity to the freight industry. We do this by building autonomy software that tag-teams with human drivers. Conventional trucks drive ~120K miles/ year. Trucks with our tech can hit more than 190K miles/ year.
tags: industry:autonomous-trucking; industry:hard-tech; industry:robotics; industry:transportation; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

raw_markdown="[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62c4c035d157331d4d502ca2/62ec778f51782c30d43d3a1f_Asset%201%404x-8.png)](https://javelinrobotics.com/</>)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62c4c035d157331d4d502ca2/62f8218a9fb1b074cdd16624_noun-menu-4625040%20\(1\).png)
# AI COPILOT FOR TRUCKS
Operate trucks powered by the Javelin virtual driver and unlock unparalleled productivity
[See for yourself](https://javelinrobotics.com/<#>)
# MEET THE JAVELIN VIRTUAL DRIVER
YOUR TRUCKS' SECOND DRIVER
  * Autonomous on-demand
  * Makes truck _more_ productive
  * Works _with_ people

[Explore Javelin Driver](https://javelinrobotics.com/</technology>)
[Explore Javelin driver](https://javelinrobotics.com/</technology>)
# THE QUICKEST WAY TO INCREASE TRUCKING CAPACITY
# DESIGNED FROM THE GROUND UP TO BE COMPATIBLE ACROSS MAJOR TRUCK OEMS
The virtual driver will be available as a subscription on your truck OEM of choice
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62c4c035d157331d4d502ca2/62eb0b2fac4b6978d40695ab_card1.png)
1.
Secure trucks from your choice of OEM
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62c4c035d157331d4d502ca2/62eb18920ad230cbedf0e9e2_card2.png)
2.
Enable the Javelin driver subscription
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62c4c035d157331d4d502ca2/62eb18a5862b3de72285ef59_card3.png)
3.
Begin hauling freight as you would
# How it works
# DRIVE ONTO FREEWAY, FOLLOWING SUGGESTED ROUTEWhen you enter a destination, the virtual driver's route optimizer generates turn-by-turn navigation on a map. The map displays where you can let the virtual driver take over.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62c4c035d157331d4d502ca2/62eb12c7cc1f8c8158df8edf_map%402x.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62c4c035d157331d4d502ca2/62eb17eacc1f8c4e15dfde19_engage%402x.png)
# WHEN AVAILABLE, FLIP A SWITCHWithin coverage, the virtual driver can be engaged and you can choose to give up total driving control, without the need to supervise anything.
# ENJOY SLEEPER OR PASSENGER BERTH TIMEWhile the virtual driver is in control, you can get off the seat and relax. Time spent off the seat does not count towards your driving hours, just as it would be with two-driver teams
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62c4c035d157331d4d502ca2/62eb18119192d5cea6cb97a1_IMG_0755%402x.png)
# BENEFIT FROM A TRULY UNIQUE DRIVER EXPERIENCE
# MAXIMIZE YOUR EARNING POTENTIALThe virtual driver is your partner and works with you like a team, helping you cover 2x more miles‍
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62c4c035d157331d4d502ca2/62e839b81a9f8f4e08a399a1_InsideView-2.png)
# GET PRECIOUS TIME BACK‍Do what makes you happy. Spend free time however you like, improving quality of life
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62c4c035d157331d4d502ca2/62e84ec7b65dd5d5d6947f42_InsideView-2.png)
# KEEP EVERYONE AROUND YOU SAFEThe virtual driver keeps everyone safe, both inside and outside‍
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62c4c035d157331d4d502ca2/62e8508f28cfb02b6c55c39f_InsideView-3.png)
[Discover Carrier Benefits](https://javelinrobotics.com/</carriers>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62c4c035d157331d4d502ca2/62e9931217864efce84d990b_3.png)
Quick Links

generated_description:
**Javelin Robotics: The Future of Trucking**

Founded in 2020 and a proud member of Y Combinator's Batch W21, Javelin Robotics is on a mission to transform the trucking industry with its innovative "copilot" technology. Operating out of San Francisco with a lean team of just five, Javelin is focused on building autonomy software that enhances the productivity of human truck drivers.

### The Problem They Solve

The freight industry has long been burdened by the limitations of conventional trucks, which typically cover around 120,000 miles per year. Javelin's technology dramatically increases this capacity: trucks equipped with their system can achieve more than 190,000 miles annually. This improvement is crucial in a sector that is often facing capacity shortages.

### How It Works

Javelin's autonomous solution acts as a "virtual driver" that collaborates with human operators, allowing them to share driving duties. Here's the gist:

1. **Ease of Use**: Drivers can engage the virtual system on designated routes, handing over control when safe.
2. **Maximized Productivity**: By functioning as a second driver, Javelin's technology allows for longer hauls and more efficient deliveries. This means drivers can spend more time resting—a critical factor in reducing fatigue.
3. **Transporter Safety**: The system is designed to prioritize safety for everyone involved, reinforcing the idea that technology should enhance human capabilities without compromising well-being.

### Business Model

Javelin's virtual driver technology is subscription-based, integrated across various truck OEMs. This flexibility allows carriers to adopt the system seamlessly while tailoring it to their fleet's specific needs. It's a straightforward approach that aligns with modern trucking operations.

### The Road Ahead

With their cutting-edge AI and robotics technology, Javelin Robotics stands at the forefront of a revolution in autonomous trucking. Their commitment to working with human drivers rather than replacing them is a smart move that acknowledges the critical role of human judgment in the transport industry.

For more information, you can visit their [website](https://javelinrobotics.com) and explore how they're aiming to redefine efficiency in transportation.

### Conclusion

In a world where time is money—and where trucking plays a vital role in the economy—Javelin Robotics is not just building software; they are redefining what's possible for the industry. If successful, they could be the driving force behind the next leap in logistics and freight transport. Keep an eye on them—this is just the beginning.
